item.description:
Let's try to get the downstairs back room again for our group!  Worst case we'll grab the couches just outside the room or gather at the bar.  I'll get there early that night and update once I know if the room is available or not.  I HAVE to try this:

"Caramel Apple Sangria is back! Our heavenly unique blend of white and apple wines, clear caramel apple liqueur, apple rum, caramel vodka, apple juice, and sweet fall spices"

Stop by any time throughout the evening!  This is a casual event.  Always nice to see the regulars and also fun to meet our new members!
item.name: Friday night happy hour at Venetian Moon in Reading!
